# Davis Copilot
## DQL is super powerful, but what if we could use generative AI to do some of the hard work for us?
![](https://mkt-cdn.dynatrace.com/assets/Marketing/content-images/_1920x921_crop_center-center_100_line/davis-chart.png.webp)

## Exercise 1: Let's use Davis CoPilot to build the DQL for some of the previous exercises
1. Give me the count of all SEVERE and ERROR logs grouped by log level with a 5-minute interval
2. Count the current number of active problems 
3. Identify the top 10 most problem affected entities within your environment
4.  Count the "com.easytrade.buy.start" biz events summarized by "accountId" and summarized by timestamp

## Experiment with Davis CoPilot and see what's possible!
